mapper.select: select p.*, f.field_name, u.name from plant_log p join field f on p.field_id = f.id join user u on p.user_id = u.id where p.field_id = #{fieldId}
mapper.insert: insert into plant_log(field_id, user_id, log_time, work, remark) values(#{fieldId}, #{userId}, #{logTime}, #{work}, #{remark})
